DOC.brief_title: Measurements Of Lower Limbs And Spine Based On Biplanar Radiographs : Microdose Compared To Standard Dose Protocol
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluation accuracy reliability 2D 3D measurement spine low limb adult base biplanar radiograph MicroDose protocol compare standard dose protocol Part 1 : retrospective evaluation 50 patient : low limb image MicroDose protocol lower limb image standard dose protocol Part 2 : prospective evaluation 100 patient : low limb image MicroDose protocol lower limb image standard dose protocol Part 3 : prospective evaluation 150 patient : spine image MicroDose protocol spine limb image standard dose protocol
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : All patient refer biplanar radiograph spine low limb ( 18 99 year age ) Exclusion criterion : inform consent
